messages.subject: Lifestyles and dependance on oil
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/17/03 8:24:38 AM Central Standard Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:  I
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/17/03 8:24:38 AM Central Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Maybe we could share ideas for living lightly. >>

I would love ideas for folks right in the city. There is obvious
environmental stuff we can do, like recycle, ride our bikes etc..
But I'd love ideas on how to make our home and property more self sustaining
and also how to get off the power grid in town!! We've talked about doing
some solar stuff but I don't know anyone else that has done this in
town....anyone?

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
